name: Cursed Cactus
description:
Notes! :

Dragging mouse works for scrolling as well!

Scroll down to reveal more story after each level.

Looks like the game crushes on Google Chrome after 3rd level. Firefox works fine.

Description:

Made for KenneyJam2020. Theme: cursed

This a survival strategy game made in a style of story. You follow along a village that made a terrible mistake and is now facing the consequences.

Balance is probably out of whack.

No sounds unfortunately
